title: Snowboarder Fizz

embed.description: This was originally started for the Riot Art Contest on Polycount. Decided to finish it. Thanks for visiting! Rigged by Moonyoung Oh https://vimeo.com/user33451057 Animated by Sangmin Lee https://vimeo.com/user9322742

body:
Hello everyone. Here is a skin I made awhile back. Went back to finish it up.  Special shoutout to my rigger [Moonyoung Oh](https://vimeo.com/user33451057) and animator [Sangmin Lee](https://vimeo.com/user9322742) for the help!

Hope you guys like it and thanks for looking! 
:)

- Fuzziefuzz

replies.body: Why on earth does the penguin have teeth on its tongue???
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e4GeloSzsXo/T9cfg-D1fGI/AAAAAAAAA0Q/11LtkcApvo8/s1600/Penguin+Teeth.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/JN1jiVG.gif"

{{champion:432}} "Woo he beoo waoooo"
TRANSLATION:"Mother of god I must check my penguin meeps in they have this!"
I don't know why, but I find this hilarious
That's actually kind of disgusting. I don't think I can pursue my career as a penguin orthodontist anymore...

> [{quoted}](name=Fritterz,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KOOckE5Q,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-02-24T16:53:30.993+0000)
>
> Why on earth does the penguin have teeth on its tongue???


http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2770/4223979640_2c6b13a425.jpg

^^ That's why
I feel like Tundra Fizz would highly approve of this skin xD
He totally does <3

> [{quoted}](name=Sohleks,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KOOckE5Q,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-02-25T07:37:18.720+0000)
>
> He totally does <3

Hehe
Srsly turn this into a custom skinnn
That would be cool!
It's very nice indeed.

This is amazing, 
RITO it's already made for you, just pop it in the game XD x {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
As much as I hate Fizz right now... this skin is really well done. Like REALLY well done. Like official Riot skin stuff. Nice work.
Fizz is my favourite champion and I think your idea is good e is niceðŸ‘Œ

Oh lord...

Emojis in the League of Legends forum boards...

I never thought this day would come.

Sweet skin concept.
However, The teeth on the penguins tongue freak me out a bit.
Also, I do believe that ultimate animation is based on a Tropical species of penguin.
I love it, it's really well done! I hope Riot designers see this finished version and make this skin come true.
i would easily pay 1350rp for this
I don't think it would be 1350, just looking at the walking animations, the auto attack animations, the way his e looks like...It looks more of a 1850.

without a VO it would be 1350. lookat the new LB skin. new animations for everything. 1350


and void fizz... all new animations.. slight voice tweak... 1350

I'm talking about the way he goes on his snowboard, in all the other fizz skins, he just jumps on top of his pole but in this one, he actually rides the snowboard. For his  Q, instead of just spinning through you, he rides his snowboard. His auto attack animations are different, in all the other fizz skins, he stabs you with his trident. But in this skin, he smacks you with his snowboard. I'm convinced that if the skin is to be released, it will be 1820
Nice 3d modeling dude. It's so crisp and clean. It's just beautiful. I like giant penguin's design too!
I love the skin design, but here are the problems I see with it: theres already a tundra fizz skin and the snowboard doesn't look like his urchin spear.
I hate Fizz with a burning passion but.... give me this skin please.

Fantastic! That is the best Fizz skin concept I have come across!

I hope Riot makes this come to life or you release it as a custom skin!

GL!

This is adorable!

I love the winter so another cold-themed Fizz skin would be awesome :D
That's actually really good, nice job. Helps the fact that I love playing Fizz.
high quality fan art!
whataniceskin!
I logged in just to upvote! This is awesome {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} I love this skin! Although fizz is my most hated champion, I would buy this anyday! 
P.S. I love how his head tentacles are the appendages on helmet covers.
Radical dude!
RASTA FIZZ
rad {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Totally radical!
Awesome. I hope Riot is gonna see this
Even though I hate Fizz, I really like the idea! I hope riot implements it! :D
The "shark" penguin thing is hella creepy, but otherwise reaaaaaaaallly nice work.
Sickkk!!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
